body_html:
@ispirmustafa Wired. I tried to reproduce this issue with a simple project (https://github.com/iron9light/tensorflow_issue19084), but everything goes fine. My real project still has this issue with tensorflow 2.10.

Anyway, you can think it's a feature request:
Add an init_state_trainable: bool as the param of nn.dynamic_rnn or make it a feature of nn.rnn_cell.RNNCell class
